disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.latencyCalculation: The latency calculation function used is: (1 / (mts / 2) * cl) * 1000 to calculate nanoseconds.
disclaimers.scoreExplanation: To differentiate the memories, a penalty was applied to each one in the score. This is a subjective method.
disclaimers.subjectivity: This method is subjective, meaning it is not an absolute measure but rather an approximation.
disclaimers.goodScores: A score above 6 is considered a good value.
